title: Trump meets families of freed Israeli hostages
shortDescription: President Donald Trump met families of freed Israeli hostages and former hostages at the Knesset.

title: Trump signs Israel-Hamas ceasefire deal
shortDescription: President Donald Trump signed the Israel-Hamas ceasefire deal as hostages and prisoners were freed with aid flowing into Gaza.

title: Trump meeting with Xi back on as US softens tone with China
shortDescription: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said he expects Trump and Chinese President Xi Jinping to still meet this month after Trump threatened to back out.

title: Trump says he won't get into heaven. What religion is he?
shortDescription: President Donald Trump spoke to reporters on AF1 saying he won't get into heaven after the peace agreement between Israel and Hamas.

title: Key moments in Trump's trip to Israel, Egypt for ceasefire deal
shortDescription: Trump gave an hour-long speech to the Israeli parliament as hostages were freed and the Palestinian prisoner release began. Here are the key moments.

title: A triumphant Trump basks in Mideast praise and promises more
shortDescription: There will be hurdles ahead in the path to peace, but Trump's address to the Knesset was the sort of historic moment presidents dream of having.

title: Trump gets standing ovation in Israel
shortDescription: President Donald Trump received a standing ovation at the Knesset in Israel for helping free 20 surviving Israeli hostages held by Hamas.

title: Man expelled from Knesset during Trump’s speech
shortDescription: A man who interrupted President Donald Trump's speech from the Knesset, Israel's legislature, was quickly expelled.

title: Naked Portland riders, some in just flip flops, protest Trump policy
shortDescription: The World Naked Bike Ride on Oct. 12 sought to bring global attention to President Donald Trump’s plans to deploy National Guard troops to the city.

title: Trump warns Russia that US may give Ukraine Tomahawk missiles
shortDescription: President Donald Trump threatened to provide Ukraine with Tomahawk missiles to pressure Russia to end the 3-year-old war.

title: Trump, China play blame game over rising trade tensions, new tariffs
shortDescription: Beijing responded to President Donald Trump's 100% tariffs on Chinese imports.

title: Ceasefire holds in Gaza ahead of hostage release and Trump's visit to Israel
shortDescription: A ceasefire between Israel and Hamas held in Gaza for a third day ahead of the expected release of Israeli hostages and Palestinian prisoners.

title: Donald Trump falsely says 'Biden FBI' placed agents in Jan. 6 crowds
shortDescription: The Jan. 6, 2021 insurrection, when a violent mob swarmed the U.S. Capitol, occurred while Trump was still in office.

title: Trump can't deploy National Guard in Illinois, but troops can stay: Court
shortDescription: The brief ruling by the federal appeals court in Chicago said President Donald Trump can still federalize the National Guard and already-deployed troops can stay.

title: Trump administration begins government layoffs
shortDescription: President Donald Trump's administration made good on a threat to fire thousands of federal workers, with agencies sending "reduction in force" notifications heading into the weekend.

title: President Trump says he has found funds to pay US military in shutdown
shortDescription: President Donald Trump, who had said the US military would not miss paychecks amid the shutdown, said the administration found funds to pay troops.

title: Presdent Donald Trump cites incorrect approval ratings in Truth Social post
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has recently boasted about having record-high approval ratings, but a closer look reveals a gap between his claims and actual polling data.
